main event: A big ball of blue flame fell from the sky and exploded near Moose Factory.
interesting points: The object appeared about the size of a full moon and dissolved into sparkles upon disintegration., The explosion lit up the area brighter than daylight., Witnesses heard no noise when the object fell., The incident was reported to tie in with prior sightings in nearby areas., The object was believed to be a meteor based on its observed characteristics.
witness description: an employee of the Hudson Bay Company
